exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="bag" width="540" height="960" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="bgEffect13_png" x="0" y="0" fillMode="scale" width="100%" height="100%" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image source="normalBg_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image source="bgEffect01_png" x="2.67" y="254"/>
	<e:Image source="bgEffect12_png" y="263.34" horizontalCenter="1"/>
	<e:Button id="closeBtn" label="" x="439" y="187">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="closeBtn_png" source.down="closeBtn_png" source.disabled="closeBtn_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Scroller width="374" height="492" x="84.67" y="263.33">
		<e:Group id="scrollG" x="1.33" width="100%" height="100%">
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:CheckBox id="tqCheck" label="" x="113" y="208">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="tiqu2_png" source.down="tiqu1_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:CheckBox>
	<e:CheckBox id="yyCheck" label="" x="278" y="208">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="yongyou2_png" source.down="yongyou1_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:CheckBox>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="choiceWW" width="540" height="960" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="bgEffect13_png" x="0" y="0" width="100%" height="100%" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image source="choiceTitle_png" horizontalCenter="0" top="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:CheckBox id="rdCheck" label="" x="96" y="88">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="rd2_png" source.down="rd1_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:CheckBox>
	<e:CheckBox id="jbCheck" label="" x="313" y="88">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="jb2_png" source.down="jb1_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:CheckBox>
	<e:Scroller id="scroller" width="100%" height="845" y="114" locked="true">
		<e:Group id="scrollG" width="100%" anchorOffsetY="0" height="845">
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Button id="topBtn" label="" x="49" y="870">
		<e:skinName>
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="choiceMark_png" source.down="choiceMark_png" source.disabled="choiceMark_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="choiceWWCell" width="540" height="272" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="choiceCell_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Button id="choiceBtn" label="" x="329" y="198">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="choiceBtn_png" source.down="choiceBtn_png" source.disabled="choiceBtn_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Image source="choiceInfo_png" x="298" y="56" locked="true"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="gameLayer" width="540" height="960" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Group id="showGroup" width="400" height="520" x="69" y="142">
		<e:Image source="showBg_png" x="0" y="0"/>
		<e:Image source="1001_png" x="221" y="447.09" anchorOffsetX="34" width="68" anchorOffsetY="88" height="88"/>
		<e:Image source="1001_png" x="91" y="447.09" anchorOffsetX="34" width="68" anchorOffsetY="88" height="88"/>
		<e:Image source="1001_png" x="334.16" y="447.09" anchorOffsetX="34" width="68" anchorOffsetY="88" height="88"/>
		<e:Image source="1001_png" x="174.61" y="491.09" anchorOffsetX="34" width="68" anchorOffsetY="88" height="88"/>
		<e:Image source="1001_png" x="289" y="491.09" anchorOffsetX="34" width="68" anchorOffsetY="88" height="88"/>
		<e:Image id="winBox" source="winBox_png" x="0" y="524" anchorOffsetY="111"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image source="gameBg_png" x="0" y="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="noticeBg" source="noticeBg_png" x="0" y="90"/>
	<e:Button id="wechatBtn" label="" x="0" y="383.65">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="wechat_png" source.down="wechat_png" source.disabled="wechat_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="giftBtn" label="" x="0" y="306.37">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="gift_png" source.down="gift_png" source.disabled="gift_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="invateBtn" label="" x="0" y="230.61">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="invate_png" source.down="invate_png" source.disabled="invate_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="kefuBtn" label="" x="18.18" y="16.97">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="kefu_png" source.down="kefu_png" source.disabled="kefu_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Image id="friendsBg" source="friendsBg_png" x="474.86" y="177.09" anchorOffsetX="72"/>
	<e:Button id="payBtn" label="" x="210.61" y="895">
		<e:skinName>
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="gamePay_png" source.down="gamePay_png" source.disabled="gamePay_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="bagBtn" label="" x="293.94" y="895">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="gameBag_png" source.down="gameBag_png" source.disabled="gameBag_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="showBtn" label="" x="375.76" y="895">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="gameShow_png" source.down="gameShow_png" source.disabled="gameShow_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="taskBtn" label="" x="457.59" y="895" anchorOffsetX="0">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="gameTask_png" source.down="gameTask_png" source.disabled="gameTask_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Image id="scoreBg" source="scoreBg_png" x="10.48" y="910.91"/>
	<e:Label id="scoreText" text="9999" x="60.19" y="919.94" size="20"/>
	<e:Image id="luckyBg" source="luckyBg_png" x="103.48" y="657.21"/>
	<e:Image id="luckyBar" source="luckyBar_png" x="111.17" y="665" width="20" scale9Grid="6,0,8,20"/>
	<e:Label id="luckyText" text="幸运值：0/0" y="665" size="20" bold="true" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Label id="nameText" text="我的名字" y="886" size="20" bold="true" horizontalCenter="-193" textColor="0xffffff"/>
	<e:Group id="startGroup" width="320" height="140" x="108" y="708">
		<e:Button id="startBtn" label="" x="-11.019999999999996" y="24" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="startBtn_png" source.down="startBtn_png" source.disabled="startBtn_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="changeBtn" label="" x="207.16000000000003" y="24" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="changeBtn_png" source.down="changeBtn_png" source.disabled="changeBtn_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="playGroup" width="320" height="140" x="108" y="708" visible="false">
		<e:Button id="goBtn" label="" x="204" y="29">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="goBtn_png" source.down="goBtn_png" source.disabled="goBtn_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="upBtn" label="" x="55" y="11.6">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="upN_png" source.down="upD_png" source.disabled="upD_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="rightBtn" label="" x="111" y="44.4">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="rightN_png" source.down="rightD_png" source.disabled="rightD_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="downBtn" label="" x="55" y="79.6">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="downN_png" source.down="downD_png" source.disabled="downD_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="leftBtn" label="" x="-3" y="44.6" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="leftN_png" source.down="leftD_png" source.disabled="leftD_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Image source="middle_png" x="55" y="47.6"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image source="gameLight_png" x="69" y="139"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="hand" width="93" height="500" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="handNode" width="0" height="0" horizontalCenter="0" top="0">
		<e:Group id="handArm" width="0" height="0" y="0" x="0">
			<e:Image id="handR" source="4_png" x="-0.33" y="157.67"/>
			<e:Image id="handL" source="4_png" x="-0.33" y="157.67" scaleX="-1"/>
			<e:Image source="2_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" scale9Grid="0,11,4,71" height="300" top="-167" horizontalCenter="0"/>
			<e:Image source="3_png" y="132" horizontalCenter="0" x="-19" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Image source="1_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" top="-11" horizontalCenter="0" scale9Grid="11,8,71,11" height="60"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="shadow" source="shadow_png" y="466" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="load" width="540" height="960" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="loadBgCell_png" x="0" y="0" width="100%" fillMode="repeat" height="100%"/>
	<e:Image id="loadBg" source="loadBg_png" y="808" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="loadBar" width="20" height="23" x="41.5" y="816.66" source="loadBar_png" scale9Grid="8,1,8,22"/>
	<e:Label id="loadNum" text="0/0" y="818" size="20" anchorOffsetX="0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalAlign="middle" bold="true"/>
	<e:Label text="loading..." y="792" size="16" horizontalCenter="0" bold="true"/>
	<e:Image source="loadEffect_png" horizontalCenter="0" top="0"/>
	<e:Image source="loadName_png" y="628" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="loginGift" width="540" height="960" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="bgEffect13_png" x="0" y="0" width="100%" height="100%"/>
	<e:Image source="normalBg_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image source="bgEffect05_png" x="32" y="110"/>
	<e:Image source="bgEffect10_png" x="321" y="721"/>
	<e:Image source="bgEffect07_png" y="196" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image source="bgEffect06_png" y="243" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Button id="closeBtn" label="close" x="397" y="175"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="recharge" width="540" height="960" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="bgEffect13_png" x="0" y="0" width="100%" height="100%" locked="true"/>
